alert.note: Alert for Northern Lycoming; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A GUSTY SHOWER WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN LYCOMING AND SULLIVAN COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM EDT... At 429 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower 12 miles east of Montoursville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Muncy, Hughesville, Biggertown, Lairdsville, Ricketts Glen State Park, Muncy Valley, Picture Rocks, Dushore, Laporte and Eagles Mere. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This gusty shower may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central Pennsylvania.
